text: Is there a way to get the thumbnail of a HubSpot hosted video from the video id? using a video field to load in a video as a lightbox and i want to display the thumbnail in the overview of all videos
Can you us orderBy date in the related blog posts macro?
If I had a macro that calls `get_asset_url` with a relative path, will that path be relative to the macro call or the macro definition?

In the end, it seems that this is the culprit:
`{{ post.postBody|striptags|truncate(250, True, "...")  }}`
My colleague who built that module used the line above to print the post body summary and apparently it was working since he was able to publish it, but now HS is complaining about it, so I tried this instead
`{{ post.postSummary|striptags|truncate(250, True, "...")  }}`
and it works.
